lines.dialogue: Jesus Christ you left that down to the wire didn't you... I don't know why you needed to swap to the other track at all, were you trying to psych me out? It won't work punk. I have all the power here! I'll let it pass, for now, but if you want to continue this pleasant existance of yours you'll need to speed up a little.
lines.instruction: Press enter to promise to be faster...
